chunk:
Ajara Ayurvedic Beauty Eye Butter, Sandalwood Rose

Brand: Ajara Ayurvedic Beauty

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Organic Ghee,Organic Sandalwood oil, Rose oil, Organic Lavender oil, Organic Lemon oil
book: 2816-Ajara Ayurvedic Beauty Eye Butter, Sandalwood Rose

chunk: Directions: Start by lightly wetting the area around the eyes with water. Using a cotton swab or spatula, remove a half a pea sized amount of eye butter from the jar. Dot the butter around the eye area, then gently tap it into the skin. Avoid dragging or pulling at the skin to apply it. Wipe away any excess butter with a damp cotton
book: 2816-Ajara Ayurvedic Beauty Eye Butter, Sandalwood Rose

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 2816-Ajara Ayurvedic Beauty Eye Butter, Sandalwood Rose
